snippet: As Iran and the United States began talks in Geneva to advance negotiations over Iran’s disputed nuclear activities, a top Israeli intelligence official said he believed that Iran was serious about ensuring the success of the negotiations.
abstract: Top Israeli intelligence official Brig Gen Itai Brun says he believes Iran is serious about ensuring success of negotiations with the United States over its disputed nuclear activities; assessment appears more optimistic than that of Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu.
lead_paragraph: As Iran and the United States began talks in Geneva to advance negotiations over Iran’s disputed nuclear activities, a top Israeli intelligence official said he believed that Iran was serious about ensuring the success of the negotiations.

headline.main: Israel: General Has Hopeful View About the Nuclear Talks With Iran
headline.print_headline: Israel: General Has Hopeful View About the Nuclear Talks With Iran
